comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: American opera singer Alma Gluck (1884-1938), b. Reba Feinsohn in Bucharest. Married violinist Efrem Zimbalist, mother of actor Efrem Zimbalist Jr., grandmother of actress Stephanie Zimbalist. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alma_Gluck

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
